about_the_game:
You've been hired as human resources manager of a monster circus.

In this hyper-realistic simulator, you'll have to:
  • sort through CVs to find the perfect clown
  • distinguish between hobbyists and professionals at job interviews (because the circus is serious business)
  • offer training courses to your acrobats so they can improve their skills
  • make sure the whole troupe stays in shape for the tour

The tours will get grander and grander, and more and more unsettling... Will you be able to do your job properly and keep up with all your duties? Or will you end up as tortured as this merry band of clowns?

Features

  • A hyper-realistic physical environment that will make you feel like you're behind a desk


  • Choices that affect your mental health, the well-being of your recruits and the success of your shows


  • Mysteries and horrors surrounding the circus and its director, Monsieur Loyal

name: Freak Festival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550 / equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: High-Range Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX / equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in the human resources hell of a freak show! Recruit, train and manage artists on tour. Make your way through the dangerous mysteries surrounding the circus, and make sure you don't end up at the end of your rope...
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
